<span class="hljs-class"><span class="hljs-keyword">class</span> <span class="hljs-title">K0rz3n_secret_flag</span> </span>{    <span class="hljs-keyword">protected</span> <span class="hljs-variable">$file_path</span>;    <span class="hljs-function"><span class="hljs-keyword">function</span> <span class="hljs-title">__destruct</span><span class="hljs-params">()</span></span>{        <span class="hljs-keyword">if</span>(preg_match(<span class="hljs-string">'/(log|etc|session|proc|read_secret|history|class)/i'</span>, <span class="hljs-variable">$this</span>->file_path)){            <span class="hljs-keyword">die</span>(<span class="hljs-string">"Sorry Sorry Sorry"</span>);        }<span class="hljs-keyword">include_once</span>(<span class="hljs-variable">$this</span>->file_path); }}

1.走了

entry.content:
Test

title: Hello World

Welcome to Hexo! This is your very first post. Check documentation for more info. If you get any problems when using Hexo, you can find the answer in troubleshooting or you can ask me on GitHub.

Quick Start

Create a new post

$ hexo <span class="xml"><span class="hljs-tag"><<span class="hljs-title">span</span> <span class="hljs-attribute">class</span>=<span class="hljs-value">"hljs-keyword"</span>></span></span>new<span
